This blog has been created so I would have a place to put my ideas for D&D characters and maybe the story of a few characters I've played in the past. 

If you have a concept, story, dungeon map or just an image that you've made and would like to share, by all means feel free to submit it.

tags: i checked the rebroadcast schedule for geek and sundry
summary: Hey, guys! Does anyone know when the next Critical Role Rebroadcast will be? The website doesn’t have a countdown right now, and...
body: Hey, guys! Does anyone know when the next Critical Role Rebroadcast will be? The website doesn’t have a countdown right now, and I unfortunately missed both the live-stream & Friday rebroadcast ‘cause I had to go to the doctor. It’ll really help me if any of y’all know when the next one will be. Thank you! No spoilers please.

reblog.comment: Hey, guys! Does anyone know when the next Critical Role Rebroadcast will be? The website doesn’t have a countdown right now, and I unfortunately missed both the live-stream & Friday rebroadcast ‘cause I had to go to the doctor. It’ll really help me if any of y’all know when the next one will be. Thank you! No spoilers please.

summary: I work inna bookstore and today I sold a bunch of DnD books to a guy and we started talking about homebrew classes and the...
body:
I work inna bookstore and today I sold a bunch of DnD books to a guy and we started talking about homebrew classes and the folllowing conversation insues.

Him: I kind of wanna play a bloodhunter but the only thing I’ve seen them do is get stabbed a few times and die, so idk.

Me:

Him:

Me: Are you talking about Mollymauk?

Him: …Yes.

Me: (internally screaming)
